dc_title_s: Public School Administration Points: District of Columbia
dc_description_s: DC Public Schools Administrative Offices. This dataset contains points representing administrative offices. It was created for the D.C. public schools and later added to the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO). This dataset includes all identifiable DCPS offices, facilities, school parking lots, and warehouses. Does not include any public, private or charter school information. Administrative Office locations were obtained from public school and administrative office listing obtained from the DC Public Schools, Office of Facilities Management. Current for the 2005-06 school year. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters. METADATA CONTENT IS IN PROCESS OF VALIDATION AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
